#nametype [nametype]: 107
The soldiers of the Phoenix Empire proudly present their Telkhine legacy by coloring their armor and clothing with the purple dye of their ancestors. Another legacy of the Telkhines is obvious in the iron armor worn by the heavy infantry of the Phoenix Empire.
